data.lyric:
[ti:By My Lonely]
[ar:Kevin Gates/Becky G]
[al:Chicken Noodle Soup]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]By My Lonely - Kevin Gates
[00:00.43]Killers in my hood they know me by my first name
[00:03.44]You know 'em by their work name I know 'em by their birth name
[00:06.73]Type of weight make a man stand on principle
[00:09.61]Kill yourself but get your whole fam slammed on principle
[00:12.85]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[00:15.78]Lonely
[00:16.14]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[00:18.69]By my lonely
[00:19.42]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[00:22.02]By my lonely
[00:23.45]F**k n***a I don't wanna be your homie
[00:26.17]For real
[00:26.65]Yeah Speaker Knockerz I just ordered up I got a hundred in
[00:29.66]Keep the mop watch how you talk to me b***h I'm not one of them
[00:32.90]General for real g-give a decree the streets salute me
[00:35.80]Sweaty sheets jumpin' up outta my sleep this how we gotta go eat
[00:39.06]Safety pin apiece c*****e resin stuck on the side of the scale
[00:42.36]Watchin' the cameras
[00:43.11]If you can deal with the smell dealin' with paraphernal'
[00:45.53]Weight in the pale keepin' 'em off of the trail
[00:47.66]Texture up under my nails
[00:48.73]Storm comin' bond money inevitable that you sit in a cell
[00:52.26]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[00:55.15]Lonely
[00:55.39]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[00:57.88]By my lonely
[00:58.53]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[01:01.12]By my lonely
[01:02.55]F**k n***a I don't wanna be your homie
[01:05.10]For real
[01:05.40]Sick and tired of my phone ringin' workin' that b***h I'm takin' a call
[01:08.40]Hello
[01:08.56]Workin' with bricks I'm drivin' a car
[01:09.93]Killer
[01:10.39]Got my body hard
[01:11.74]Big ol' stepper with a rod shop in the mall no bodyguard
[01:14.91]Heavy metal in my section I'm controllin' I'm in charge
[01:18.23]It's the heavily respected I'll take a b***h to war
[01:21.50]B***h I got steppers in my section bodies on their firearms
[01:24.82]Blow the clothes off your back boom boom set off car alarms
[01:27.88]C-C-Carbon with a drum tiger you no try to run
[01:31.38]Give a f**k 'bout your Chanel
[01:32.77]I don't
[01:33.15]I'm tied in with the mayor
[01:34.39]Achoo
[01:34.78]Go sit down went to jail
[01:36.44]I'm part of the cartel
[01:37.86]I'm a Breadwinner don and we came up from nothin'
[01:41.02]And we prayed off crumbs I was raised in the slums
[01:44.38]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[01:47.10]Lonely
[01:47.54]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[01:50.19]By my lonely
[01:50.82]I had to make a couple bands by my lonely
[01:53.43]By my lonely
[01:54.88]F**k n***a I don't wanna be your homie
[01:57.66]For real
data.trans:
[ti:By My Lonely]
[ar:Kevin Gates/Becky G]
[al:Chicken Noodle Soup]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.43]杀手在我的地盘 他们都和我很熟悉
[00:03.44]你只知道他们工作上的名字 我知道他们的全名
[00:06.73]这样的压力让人更加坚持原则
[00:09.61]自杀身亡 却让你的家人被抨击
[00:12.85]我必须靠自己挣钱
[00:15.78]自己
[00:16.14]我必须靠自己挣钱
[00:18.69]靠自己
[00:19.42]我必须靠自己挣钱
[00:22.02]靠自己
[00:23.45]孬种 我不想做你的朋友
[00:26.17]真的
[00:26.65]就像Speaker Knockerz 我混出来了 我赚到了很多钱
[00:29.66]保持警惕 注意你和我说话的语气 碧池 我不是普通人
[00:32.90]就像一个将军 一声令下 大家都对我敬礼
[00:35.80]汗水湿透了床单 我从睡梦中醒来 我们要享用饕餮盛宴
[00:39.06]随时保证安全 那玩意儿都粘在了秤上
[00:42.36]小心别人偷拍
[00:43.11]这么多的东西在面前 你能不能接受这种局面
[00:45.53]无足轻重 让他们找不到方向
[00:47.66]那种东西的口感更好了
[00:48.73]风暴即将来临 准备保证金 你免不了一场牢狱之灾
[00:52.26]我必须靠自己挣钱
[00:55.15]自己
[00:55.39]我必须靠自己挣钱
[00:57.88]靠自己
[00:58.53]我必须靠自己挣钱
[01:01.12]靠自己
[01:02.55]孬种 我不想做你的朋友
[01:05.10]真的
[01:05.40]电话一直响 我真是受够了 教训那个碧池 我会接听电话
[01:08.40]你好
[01:08.56]我开着车 运着货
[01:09.93]杀手
[01:10.39]让我的身体僵硬
[01:11.74]身上带着家伙 毫不畏惧 在商场购物 不带保镖
[01:14.91]我拿着重型武器 我控制一切 我掌管一切
[01:18.23]深受大家尊敬 我会带个女人去决斗
[01:21.50]碧池 我身边有很多残忍无情的人 他们的武器不会手下留情
[01:24.82]把你的衣服都打得千疮百孔 砰砰 汽车警报不停响
[01:27.88]超大容量的弹夹 就像一只猛虎 你别想逃
[01:31.38]谁管你的香奈儿
[01:32.77]我不在乎
[01:33.15]就像我和市长有交情
[01:34.39]//
[01:34.78]让你坐好 让你进监狱
[01:36.44]我背后有一个超强大的联盟
[01:37.86]我是个挣钱养家的人 我们白手起家
[01:41.02]我们曾经祈祷能吃上面包屑 我在贫民窟长大
[01:44.38]我必须靠自己挣钱
[01:47.10]自己
[01:47.54]我必须靠自己挣钱
[01:50.19]靠自己
[01:50.82]我必须靠自己挣钱
[01:53.43]靠自己
[01:54.88]孬种 我不想做你的朋友
[01:57.66]真的
